html.author: Sophie Kleeman
html.description: The recent hack that targeted Democratic officials and led to the resignation of Democratic National Committee chairwoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz was much bigger than initially suspected, according to a new report from the New York Times.
html.keywords: DNC Hack, Hackers, Hacks, Democrats, Hillary Clinton, Donald Trump, Gizmodo
html.title: The DNC Hack Was Much Bigger Than We Thought

creator: Sophie Kleeman
